articles.description: The travel bubble could help repair some of the damage inflicted by the coronavirus pandemic on the cities' hard-hit tourism and aviation industries.
articles.content:

articles.title: Eli Lilly COVID-19 Antibody Drug Gets Emergency Use Authorization From FDA - CBS New York
articles.description: Drug company Eli Lilly has received emergency use authorization for its antibody drug, which is similar to the antibody drug President Donald Trump received after testing positive for COVID-19.
